text: May be this is not the right group, but i try: do you know if it's possibile to custumize a module meeting in HubSpot( for exemple changing colors and font)?
Is it possible to add modules to blogs? For examples if I wanted to add a module that features an ebook download CTA. Is that possible?
Yes, if it's added to the blog template.

To chime in my 2 cents…
If it’s a drag and drop blog listing template, then it will be as easy as dragging it on the page
If it’s a blog post template, then you’d have to include the module via code
It is a blog page template. So it looks like I will need to code it into the template. With that being said does that limit the location options to the top and bottom of the blog content?
you could make a sidebar on the template. OR… code the module to replace a custom shortcode (placed in the blog content) `[my_blog_ebook]` with its contents
Ahh I like that shortcode idea. I'm still learning HubSpot but this seems like the direction I want to go in. Thanks <@U3T21PDBK>
yeah. Keep in mind, you’ll get layout shifts because it will be done with javascript
